mitigation_taken: ['Researchers input snippets of the original papers into large language models to test whether the models would complete phrases with "vegetative electron microscopy".', "Investigators compared information about different models' training datasets and identified the CommonCrawl dataset as the most likely vector where the term was learned.", 'A Springer Nature journal issued a contested retraction of a paper that included the term "vegetative electron microscopy".', 'Elsevier issued a correction for a paper that used the term "vegetative electron microscopy".', "Elsevier attempted to justify the term's validity before eventually issuing a correction.", 'Some publishers retracted affected papers that included the term "vegetative electron microscopy".', 'Some publishers defended affected papers that included the term "vegetative electron microscopy".', 'Automatic screening tools such as the Problematic Paper Screener now flag "vegetative electron microscopy" as a warning sign of possible AI-generated content.', 'News outlets discussed subsequent integrity investigations into papers that used the term "vegetative electron microscopy".']
assigned_subcategories: Testing & Auditing; Incident Investigation; Data Governance; Incident Response & Recovery; Content Safety Controls

mitigation_taken: ['The FBI issued an announcement warning the public and providing mitigation tips about the ongoing smishing and vishing campaign.', 'Verify the identity of the person calling you or sending text or voice messages by researching the originating number, organization, and/or person before responding.', 'Independently identify a phone number for the purported sender and call that number to verify their authenticity.', 'Carefully examine email addresses, messaging contact information (including phone numbers), URLs, and spelling used in any correspondence or communications to detect deception.', 'Look for subtle imperfections in images and videos, such as distorted hands or feet, unrealistic facial features, inaccurate shadows, watermarks, voice call lag time, and unnatural movements.', 'Listen closely to tone and word choice to distinguish between a legitimate phone call or voice message and AI-generated voice cloning.', 'When in doubt about the authenticity of someone wishing to communicate with you, contact your relevant security officials or the FBI for help.', "Never share sensitive information or an associate's contact information with people you have met only online or over the phone.", 'If contacted by someone you know via a new platform or phone number, verify the new contact information through a previously confirmed platform or trusted source.', 'Do not send money, gift cards, cryptocurrency, or other assets to people you do not know or have met only online or over the phone.', 'Independently confirm contact information prior to sending money or cryptocurrency when someone requests funds.', 'Critically evaluate the context and plausibility of any request to send money or other assets.', "Do not click on any links in an email or text message until you independently confirm the sender's identity.", 'Be careful what you download and never open an email attachment, click on links in messages, or download applications at the request of someone you have not verified.', 'Set up two-factor (or multi-factor) authentication on any account that allows it.', 'Never disable two-factor (or multi-factor) authentication once it is enabled.', 'Never provide a two-factor authentication code to anyone over email, SMS/MMS text message, or encrypted messaging applications.', 'Create a secret word or phrase with your family members to verify their identities.', "See the FBI's guidance on Spoofing and Phishing and the Public Service Announcement about criminals using generative artificial intelligence to facilitate financial fraud for additional information.", "Consult CISA resources such as 'Phishing Guidance: Stopping the Attack Cycle at Phase One' and 'Teach Employees to Avoid Phishing' for further guidance.", 'If you believe you have been the victim of the campaign, contact your relevant security officials and the FBI.', 'Report any incident to your local FBI Field Office or the Internet Crime Complaint Center (IC3) at www.ic3.gov and include as much detailed information as possible.']
assigned_subcategories: Training & Supportive Measures; Incident Reporting

mitigation_taken: ['Travelers gave Gartenmann two months to trim her trees or risk losing coverage.', 'Gartenmann paid a landscaping company $3,000 to prune her trees.', 'Gartenmann emailed photos of the cut-back branches to Travelers.', 'Travelers agreed to renew her insurance policy just days before it was set to expire.', 'Homeowners filed at least a dozen complaints with the Texas Department of Insurance since 2023.', 'A homeowner hired a roofing company to inspect the roof after State Farm threatened nonrenewal.', "After the state became involved in that homeowner's complaint, State Farm agreed to renew the policy.", 'The homeowner who lost coverage to Nationwide found a different insurer and asked the state to investigate.', "In response to the state's questions, Nationwide conducted a further review and said its underwriting associate had initially reviewed the wrong aerial report.", 'Nationwide said the correct aerial report would not have warranted any action regarding the roof.', 'State Farm cited its policy and said it was not required to provide inspection reports when the homeowner requested them.', 'In response to inquiries, Travelers stated it does not use drones when writing policies.', 'In response to a state complaint, State Farm said it does not use drones to survey properties.', 'Lawmakers are considering a bill to require health insurance companies to publicly disclose on their website and to individual customers if they use AI-based algorithms to evaluate claims.']

mitigation_taken: ['Trump administration officials have been repeatedly revising the report since Thursday.', 'Trump administration officials have been repeatedly updating the report since Thursday.', 'Department of Health and Human Services spokesman Andrew Nixon said that minor citation and formatting errors have been corrected.', 'News outlets, beginning with NOTUS, highlighted discrepancies in the report and evidence of nonexistent research.', 'The Washington Post, in consultation with AI experts, detected the use of artificial intelligence in the initial version of the report provided to journalists.']

mitigation_taken: ['The White House said the matter is being investigated.', 'The FBI issued a public service announcement warning of an ongoing malicious text and voice messaging campaign impersonating senior U.S. officials.', "FBI Director Kash Patel issued a statement saying the FBI takes threats against the president, his staff, and cybersecurity with the utmost seriousness and that safeguarding administration officials' ability to securely communicate is a top priority."]

mitigation_taken: ['Snopes contacted the Voices of Change YouTube channel to request details about the alleged debate and awaited a reply.', 'Snopes contacted representatives for Keanu Reeves to ask whether he participated in the reported debate and awaited a reply.', "Snopes asked the Voices of Change YouTube channel whether they wrote the video's narrated text and awaited a reply.", 'Sightengine analyzed a screenshot from the video and assessed it was 99% likely to be a deepfake.', 'Hive Moderation analyzed the same screenshot and assessed it was unlikely to contain AI-generated or deepfake content.', "Deepfake Total analyzed the video's audio and scored it 100% on its Fake-O-Meter, indicating the audio was likely a deepfake.", "Hiya Deepfake Voice Detector analyzed snippets of the video's audio and rated them 1/100 on its authenticity score, indicating they were likely AI-generated.", "ZeroGPT analyzed the video's narration and flagged the first few sentences as 'Human written.'", 'Searches on popular search engines returned no credible reports that the alleged debate occurred.']
assigned_subcategories: Testing & Auditing; Incident Investigation; Content Safety Controls; Incident Reporting

mitigation_taken: ['The BBC consulted a team of Sudan experts at BBC Monitoring to check the authenticity of the recordings.', 'The BBC checked other possible explanations for the recordings and concluded they were unlikely to be old clips resurfacing or the work of an impressionist.', 'A user on X recognised the August 2023 recording and identified it as matching a Facebook Live broadcast by the blogger Al Insirafi.', 'Digital forensics researcher Hany Farid compared the audio waves of the clips and noted similar patterns in speech and silence.', "After further digging, the BBC found at least four more of the Bashir recordings that were taken from the same blogger's live broadcasts.", 'The BBC contacted the TikTok account and received a text reply in which the account denied misleading the public.', 'After being contacted by the BBC, TikTok took down the account, stating it violated their guidelines on false content that may cause significant harm and their rules on the use of synthetic media.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Testing & Auditing; Content Safety Controls; Incident Reporting

mitigation_taken: ['U.S. special forces carried out a precarious evacuation of the U.S. Embassy in Sudan.', 'Western governments used a ceasefire to bring home their diplomats and rescue as many nationals as possible.', 'A social media monitoring group conducted research that concluded Islamist accounts were using images of Western-led evacuations and comparisons to Kabul to claim the West was in retreat and portray themselves as victors.', 'Valent Projects investigated and concluded that Islamist accounts were behind a faked audio message supposedly from U.S. Ambassador John Godfrey.', 'British nationals were boarded onto a Royal Air Force aircraft for evacuation to Larnaca International Airport in Cyprus.', 'The Marine Security Guard Detachment at the U.S. Embassy conducted a flag-folding ceremony and took hold of the U.S. flag on April 22, 2023.']

mitigation_taken: ['National TV removed the AI-created recording later.', 'Beam Reports has been tracking deepfakes in Sudan.', 'Beam Reports published an analysis about deepfakes in Sudan.', 'Marsad Beam worked on a report that verified the authenticity of viral content.', 'Beam Reports has been fact-checking content in Sudan since 2023.', 'Beam Reports spoke at an online UNESCO seminar in May to stress the challenges posed by AI-generated disinformation.', 'Individuals with advanced technical skills volunteered to help fact-check viral content.', 'Mohanad Elbalal reverse image searched frames of suspected deepfake clips and searched for identifiable elements to verify their authenticity.', 'Social media platforms started taking strong measures against deepfake content.', 'YouTube communicated a deepfakes policy prohibiting technically manipulated content that misleads users and may pose a serious risk of egregious harm.', 'YouTube requires creators to disclose when they have created or altered synthetic content.', 'YouTube applies a transparency label to synthetic content so viewers have important context.']

mitigation_taken: ["The Rockingham County Sheriff's Office warned parents and teens about the scam in a Facebook post.", "The Rockingham County Sheriff's Office advised people to slow down and think before clicking on sensational headlines.", "The Rockingham County Sheriff's Office urged people to double-check sources, especially if a headline promises something unbelievable or stirs up strong emotions.", "The Rockingham County Sheriff's Office asked anyone who spots suspicious content or believes someone has been targeted to contact the Rockingham County Sheriff's Office.", 'Digital safety firm Proxyware traced the scam to a centralized operation based in South Africa and identified nearly 100 websites using the same tracking code.']

mitigation_taken: ["The Vatican Press Office publicly debunked the video.", "Vatican News publicly debunked the video by confirming that the Holy Father never made such a speech.", "Rely on verified sources such as Vatican News, the official Holy See Press Office, and trusted Catholic media instead of random YouTube channels or TikToks.", "Block or mute accounts that repeatedly share false or inflammatory content to clean your feed.", "Be lovingly skeptical about apparent papal content.", "Ask questions when encountering suspicious digital content.", "Check the source of content to verify its authenticity.", "Cross-reference content with other sources before accepting it as true."]

mitigation_taken: ['GhanaFact used Google Lens to trace the original image of Traoré contained in the viral content.', 'GhanaFact performed image analysis which revealed that some persons in the original image had been cropped out and that Traoré had been fused with other characters into the viral image.', 'GhanaFact conducted further analysis using the wasitai.com AI-detection platform, which concluded there was a high possibility the image was AI-generated.', 'GhanaFact published a report declaring the image manipulated and fake.', 'GhanaFact reached out to a number of accounts that shared the images to provide them with the findings.', 'GhanaFact stated that it will update this script on an ongoing basis.']
assigned_subcategories: Testing & Auditing; Incident Investigation; Incident Reporting; Incident Response & Recovery; Post-Deployment Monitoring

mitigation_taken: ['YouTube labeled the videos as "altered or synthetic content," indicating they were AI-generated.', 'The investigative team used a software program to identify the fake pro-Traoré music videos.', 'The investigative team counted at least 294 fake music videos that were posted on YouTube.', 'The investigative team recorded that the videos obtained more than 8.6 million views.', 'The investigative team identified at least 127 YouTube channels that shared the videos.', 'The investigative team analyzed YouTube channel graphics and noted gibberish text on banners that suggested AI-generated images.', 'The investigative team contacted the person behind a YouTube channel whose clip garnered more than 1.9 million views.', "The investigative team attempted to verify the creator's claim about producing the videos.", 'The investigative team asked the creator about the identity of his sponsors but did not receive a response.']
assigned_subcategories: Content Safety Controls; Testing & Auditing; Incident Investigation; Incident Response & Recovery

mitigation_taken: ['The Rumor Scanner team investigated the circulated video and determined it was not real (a deepfake).', 'Investigators located the original Univers Inspirant YouTube video and noted its description stated the content was fictional and labeled as altered or synthetic.', 'A 15-second clip from the circulated video was uploaded to the AI detection website Hive Moderation, which reported a 99% probability the audio and a 100% probability the video were AI-generated.', 'The same 15-second clip was uploaded to the AI detection site Sensity, which indicated a 95% probability the audio and a 98% probability the video were AI-generated.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Testing & Auditing; Content Safety Controls

mitigation_taken: ['PesaCheck conducted a reverse image search on Google Lens, TinEye, and Bing to investigate the photo.', "PesaCheck closely examined the badge's style and placement and found inconsistencies with standard Rwandan military insignia.", "PesaCheck compared the image with photos of President Kagame in military attire and noted that his uniform typically bears 'CIC' and 'RDF' rather than 'M23'.", 'PesaCheck used the AI-detecting tool Hive Moderation to verify the authenticity of the photo, which indicated a 99.5% likelihood of AI-generated or deepfake content.', "PesaCheck performed further analysis using Sightengine's AI-image-detection tool, which gave the image a 99% AI-generated rating.", 'PesaCheck published a fact-check article declaring the photo to be fake.', 'PesaCheck provided readers with instructions on how to report suspected fake or false information on Facebook.', 'PesaCheck provided information and a link to its fact-checking methodology.', 'PesaCheck partnered with Facebook and similar social media platforms to help sort fact from fiction and fight misinformation.']
assigned_subcategories: Testing & Auditing; Incident Investigation; Incident Reporting; User Rights & Recourse; Third-Party System Access

mitigation_taken: ["The judge reviewed the applicant's factum again after the hearing.", 'The judge searched the CanLII website to try to find the cases cited in the factum.', 'The judge also searched Westlaw, Quicklaw, and Google and determined the unknown cases were not found there.', 'During the hearing the judge asked Ms. Lee whether her factum was prepared by artificial intelligence.', 'The judge ordered Ms. Lee to show cause why she should not be cited for contempt.', 'The judge required Ms. Lee or her counsel to attend a scheduling case conference to discuss the process for the contempt hearing.', 'The court scheduled the scheduling case conference by Zoom for May 16, 2024 at 9:00 a.m.', 'The judge reserved costs pending the outcome of the show cause proceeding for Ms. Lee.', 'The judge announced that he would personally deal with the contempt proceeding.', 'The judge afforded Ms. Lee procedural protections, including the presumption of innocence and a fair opportunity to submit evidence in the show cause proceeding.']
assigned_subcategories: Court & Law Enforcement Interventions; Incident Investigation; User Rights & Recourse

mitigation_taken: ['Rinki Murphy immediately contacted police after seeing the video.', 'Rinki Murphy immediately contacted NetSafe after seeing the video.', 'Rinki Murphy immediately contacted Health NZ Te Whatu Ora after seeing the video.', 'Rinki Murphy immediately contacted other organisations after seeing the video.', 'Some reported videos were taken down from social media platforms after they were reported.', 'Police issued a statement urging caution when making online purchases.', 'Police advised people to ask friends or family for their thoughts and get another set of eyes to look at the details if they were unsure.', 'Police warned consumers to never enter bank or card details on suspicious looking websites.', 'Police advised that victims of scams should report the matter to police and NetSafe.', 'The article directed readers to visit NetSafe for more information on scam awareness.']

mitigation_taken: ['The VA is reviewing all 76,000 of its contracts to ensure each benefits veterans and is a good use of taxpayer money.', 'Decisions to cancel or reduce the size of contracts are made after multiple reviews by VA employees, including agency contracting experts and senior staff.', 'The VA stated it will not cancel contracts that provide services to veterans or that the agency cannot perform itself without a contingency plan in place.', 'The VA stated that contracts deemed wasteful, duplicative, or involving services the VA can perform itself will typically be terminated.', "VA staff corrected errors produced by Lavingia's AI-based analysis.", 'Sahil Lavingia acknowledged flaws in the code and said mistakes were made.', "Lavingia published the 'munchable' script on his GitHub account to invite others to use and improve it.", 'No contracts were terminated without human review.', 'Lavingia was terminated from DOGE after giving an interview about his work.']

mitigation_taken: ['Do not engage with the fake account impersonating Jennifer Ketchmark.', 'If the fake account reaches out to you, report it to Meta.', "Check whether the profile name is spelled correctly and look for misspellings such as an extra 'r' in Jenniferr.", 'Check how many friends or likes the page has and treat pages with just a few as likely not legitimate.', 'Verify whether the profile has a photo and whether the photo appears legitimate.', 'Check when the profile was created and treat relatively new accounts as likely not real.', "Search for the person's name to see if the person is still active on another page.", 'Check with the legitimate account first before engaging with the new account.']

mitigation_taken: ['The author reported the deepfake avatar to experts at the Financial Times.', 'An expert colleague contacted Meta to report the adverts.', 'Meta removed and disabled the ads, accounts, and pages that were shared with them.', "Other people brought further scam posts to the author's attention.", 'On each occasion after being notified, Meta removed the posts.', 'The author was enrolled in a Meta system that uses facial recognition technology to identify and remove such scams.', "An expert colleague examined Meta's Ad Library data to assess the scale of the adverts.", 'That colleague determined there were at least three deepfake videos and multiple Photoshopped images running across over 1,700 advertisements that reached over 970,000 users in the EU.', 'The author and colleagues contacted officials at the Department for Culture, Media and Sport.', "Officials at the Department for Culture, Media and Sport directed them towards Meta's ad policies.", 'Some of the fake accounts used to purchase the ads were banned.', 'Meta said it is constantly developing new ways to make it harder for scammers to deceive others, including using facial recognition technology.', 'The author asked victims to share their experiences with the Financial Times at visual.investigations@ft.com.']

mitigation_taken: ["The Chief Adviser's Press Wing urged social media users to be more cautious and avoid being deceived by AI-generated deepfake videos.", 'The press wing posted that statement on its verified Facebook page CA Press Wing Facts.', "Investigators conducted a reverse image search and found the footage was taken from Al Jazeera's programme Talk to Al Jazeera, aired on April 27, 2025.", 'Investigators reviewed the Facebook account that posted the video.', 'Investigators found the Facebook account was created on June 14, 2022.', 'Investigators found the Facebook account appeared to be operated by multiple users based in Lithuania.', 'Investigators found the account had only four posts, all promoting a gambling app called Blue Live.', "Investigators conducted a reverse image search of key frames and linked the fake content to an original News24 YouTube video from August 10 titled 'Rangpur must become the number one district: Dr. Yunus'.", "The press wing publicly declared the video was entirely fake and AI-generated and said the voice did not match Dr. Yunus' real voice."]

mitigation_taken: ['The Ontario Provincial Police issued a public release warning about an increase in deepfake scams.', 'The Canadian Anti-Fraud Centre reported a rise in deepfake-related fraud across the country.', 'The Canadian Anti-Fraud Centre provided a hotline phone number and an online reporting link for victims to report suspicious interactions.', 'Simcoe North MP Adam Chambers warned the public about deepfake investment scams and sounded the alarm for increased awareness.', 'Adam Chambers called on platforms like Facebook, YouTube, and Google to notify users who may have interacted with fraudulent ads instead of only removing the content.', 'Adam Chambers called on crypto platforms and financial institutions to work more collaboratively with law enforcement to spot red flags and protect users.', 'Adam Chambers encouraged victims to report fraud to their local police.', 'Adam Chambers encouraged victims to contact the Canadian Anti-Fraud Centre to report suspected fraud.', 'The article noted that banks and crypto exchanges may question transfers when customers insist they are making legitimate investments.', 'Adam Chambers called for better public education, stricter enforcement tools, and stronger accountability from the platforms where these scams begin.']

mitigation_taken: ['Paul Davis said he wants to raise awareness about sophisticated AI deepfake scams following his experience.', 'Paul Davis said he wants to warn others about the sophisticated tactics fraudsters are using to extract sensitive personal information, including bank and credit card details.', 'Dr Jennifer Williams warned people to stay vigilant in the face of AI-generated scam messages.', 'Dr Jennifer Williams advised people to watch for odd phrasing in messages as a telltale sign of a scam.', 'Dr Jennifer Williams advised people to watch for highly pixelated images as a telltale sign of a scam.', "Dr Jennifer Williams advised people to watch for suspicious wording such as 'don't be afraid' as a telltale sign of a scam.", 'Dr Jennifer Williams advised people to be wary of different pixelation patterns around names, which can indicate they were digitally altered.', 'Dr Jennifer Williams stated that Facebook does not give away large sums of money or luxury vehicles as a warning to help identify scams.']

mitigation_taken: ['The 18-year-old student is under investigation for "deliberate disclosure of classified information, appropriation of classified documents" in relation to the national high school graduation exam.', 'The exam proctor caught the student while he was carrying out the cheating scheme.', 'The student told police he had purchased a bean-shaped wireless earphone and a button-sized camera through Facebook and used them to transmit the exam questions.', 'Authorities identified three other candidates at two different exam centers who used their phones to take pictures of exam questions and sent them to AI apps to solve.', 'All three of those identified students admitted to their violations.', 'Major General Tran Dinh Chung addressed a press conference about the high school graduation exam and announced that authorities had identified other candidates who used phones to photograph questions and send them to AI apps.']

mitigation_taken: ['The Ministry of Post and Telecommunications issued a statement denouncing the deepfake video as malicious disinformation and serious misconduct.', 'The Ministry of Post and Telecommunications confirmed that the footage had been edited with a fabricated Thai voice track using AI technology.', 'Authorities warned the public that the 29-second clip is part of a scam and designed to deceive the public.', 'The Ministry of Post and Telecommunications stated that those responsible for creating and spreading the deepfake must be held accountable under Cambodian law.', 'The Ministry of Post and Telecommunications urged Cambodians to critically assess suspicious videos, voices, and images and to verify information with official government sources or credible media outlets.', 'The Ministry of Post and Telecommunications urged digital communication platforms, social media users, and content creators to take part in removing the deepfake video and other forms of misinformation.', 'The Ministry of Post and Telecommunications called for stern measures to be taken against those producing and distributing such harmful content.', 'The Cambodian Centre for Independent Media Executive Director urged the governments and stakeholders to come up with a mechanism to combat fake news in a timely manner.']

If it\'s not AI, then the kids speaking have a point" and describing his adversaries as "trolls."']

mitigation_taken: ['The Department of National Defence issued a statement condemning the video as fake and a malicious attempt to destabilise the administration.', "Defence Secretary Gilberto Teodoro Jr. assured the public that the military would continue to support President Marcos Jr.'s administration and follow the chain of command.", 'Defence Secretary Gilberto Teodoro Jr. said the military would coordinate with all government agencies to suppress those behind the plot.', 'The Department of Justice condemned the fake video and said it would pursue necessary actions to identify and prosecute those behind the material.', 'Police forensic experts held a news conference to present their findings that the man in the video was not the president.', 'Police forensic experts presented comparative photos and enlarged images of faces and right ears side by side to demonstrate differences between the man in the video and President Marcos Jr.', 'Interior Secretary Benjamin Abalos said those behind the proliferation of the video would be held liable under the Cybercrime Prevention Act of 2012.', "The Commission on Elections said the agency was set to issue guidelines in August for the use of AI to promote candidates in next year's midterm elections.", 'Three lawmakers introduced a bill seeking heavier penalties for crimes committed using deepfake technology.']

mitigation_taken: ['Docomo Pacific issued a public service announcement via a press release warning residents about increasingly sophisticated AI-driven scam calls targeting elderly residents.', "Docomo Pacific highlighted several warning signs residents should be aware of, including scammers' use of genuine personal details from social media, pressure tactics urging immediate action, and requests for secrecy.", 'Docomo Pacific emphasized that legitimate organizations, including government agencies and financial institutions, never employ high-pressure tactics or demand unconventional payment methods such as gift cards.', 'Docomo Pacific recommended verifying callers by contacting family members through trusted phone numbers.', 'Docomo Pacific recommended discussing suspicious calls with trusted individuals.', 'Docomo Pacific recommended maintaining healthy skepticism about unexpected communications.', 'Docomo Pacific recommended protecting personal information.', "Docomo Pacific advised anyone who encounters suspected scam attempts to file a complaint with the Federal Communications Commission through the FCC's consumer complaints portal.", 'Docomo Pacific provided contact numbers for residents seeking additional information or assistance: 671-688-CARE (2273) for Guam and 670-488-CARE for the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.', "Baleto's mother called and verified the caller before providing any personal information."]

mitigation_taken: ['The police initiated an investigation after the woman reported that her images were being misused and circulated on social media.', 'A cyber police team employed technical surveillance to trace the IP addresses and digital footprints behind the accounts.', 'The police obtained IP logs and account details from Instagram to aid the investigation.', 'The police conducted sustained monitoring of the suspect accounts.', 'The police identified the accused based on IP logs and other digital evidence.', 'The police located the accused and arrested him.', 'The police recovered a smartphone used in the commission of the crime.', 'The police began a forensic examination of the recovered smartphone.', 'The police filed a case against the accused under sections 78 and 79 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita.']

mitigation_taken: ["Ukrinform labeled the circulated video as fake news.", "Ukrinform determined that the video had been edited using artificial intelligence and that an AI-generated audio file mimicking Biletskyi's voice was inserted into the original footage.", "Ukrinform used the Hive Moderation AI-content detection service to analyze the video's audio and reported that 99% of the audio was artificially generated.", "Ukrinform cited the serviceman's unnatural facial expressions as evidence that the video was manipulated.", 'Ukrinform identified and linked to the original May 16, 2025 video used to create the deepfake and showed that the serviceman in the original did not mention identifying fallen soldiers or compensation.', 'Ukrinform corrected the false claim about command roles by clarifying that Andrii Biletskyi is the commander of the Third Army Corps and that Colonel Denys Prokopenko is the current commander of the Azov 1st Corps.', "Ukrinform previously published a fact-check debunking the claim that 40,000 Ukrainian soldiers' bodies were being held in Russia.", 'Ukrinform previously published a fact-check debunking the claim that bodies were returned only for those whose families refused financial compensation.', 'Ukrinform previously debunked the fake story that the military commandant of the Kursk region, Eduard Moskaliov, had fled to France.']
assigned_subcategories: Content Safety Controls; Testing & Auditing; Incident Investigation; Incident Reporting

mitigation_taken: ['The Center reported that Russian Telegram channels spread deepfake videos falsely claiming Deputy Prime Minister Olga Stefanishyna proposed legally banning women aged 18 to 27 from leaving the country and that the Verkhovna Rada supported this initiative.', 'The Center clarified that there are no plans for the mobilization of women, no bills in the Verkhovna Rada proposing such changes, and no government decisions or statements about mass mobilization of women.', 'The Center issued a public warning advising people to trust only verified sources of information and not fall for enemy provocations.']

mitigation_taken: ['Authorities such as the Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission removed flagged AI-generated scam content.', 'Michael Chong and several MCA members conducted a sting operation to illustrate how victims are ensnared.', 'They pooled RM1,100 and responded to a link beneath one of the scam videos.', 'A team member played along and invested RM1,100 as part of the sting.', 'After the scammers demanded another US$250 as a processing fee, the team confirmed it was a scam and stopped engaging.']

mitigation_taken: ['The judge checked her notes and asked the chief stenographer to listen to the recording to verify the case reference.', 'The judge requested the two law researchers employed at the Pietermaritzburg High Court to peruse the supplementary notice of appeal and to provide all the cited cases to her.', 'An email was sent to Ms Pillay requesting copies of the two cases referred to in argument as well as the cases cited in the supplementary notice of appeal.', 'Ms Pillay applied for an adjournment because she had been unable to obtain the cases in the limited time available.', 'The judge requested Ms Pillay to make arrangements for Ms Rasina Farouk to attend court to explain the origin of the cases cited in the supplementary notice of appeal.', 'The judge stood the matter down to enable them to go to the high court library and draw the relevant cases.', 'A cellphone containing a reference to a Competition Tribunal matter was handed up to the judge to show a reference to a case found during the adjournment.', 'The judge agreed to adjourn the matter to September 25, 2024, to provide Mr Singh and his staff with a final opportunity to provide the cases cited in court and in the supplementary notice of appeal.', 'The judge indicated she would only accept cases from either the South African Law Reports, All South African Law Reports, or SAFLII.', 'The judge ordered that costs incurred in respect of the additional appearances be paid by the firm Surendra Singh and Associates.', 'The judge ordered that a copy of the judgment be sent to the Legal Practice Council in KwaZulu-Natal for its attention and further action.', 'The judge dismissed Mavundla’s leave to appeal with costs.', 'Ms Rasina Farouk requested an opportunity to go back to the office to look at her search history and to provide the relevant cases to the judge.', 'Mr Suren Singh indicated he tried to obtain the cases by using Google.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Incident Reporting; Incident Response & Recovery; Testing & Auditing; System Documentation

mitigation_taken: ['The magistrate postponed the case for two months to allow the parties to track down the alleged judgments.', 'The court imposed a punitive costs order against the plaintiff.', 'Rodrigues Blignaut Attorneys explored an advanced AI tool and then followed up on the findings gathered.', 'Rodrigues Blignaut Attorneys conducted extensive discussions with various high courts, court registrars in multiple provinces, and law librarians at the Legal Practice Council library to locate the cited judgments.', 'The defence team engaged in lengthy correspondence with Rodrigues Blignaut Attorneys after receiving the list of case names and citations.', 'The defence junior counsel, Ziphozihle Raqowa, spent 15 hours over four days searching for the cited judgments.', 'The Johannesburg Bar library staff attempted to track down the judgments and informed parties they could not locate them and suspected the cases were generated by ChatGPT.', 'Rossle contacted Parker’s attorneys the Friday before the hearing to ask whether they had found the real judgments.', 'In court, the plaintiff’s counsel acknowledged that the cases had been sourced through ChatGPT.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Testing & Auditing; Incident Response & Recovery; Court & Law Enforcement Interventions; Incident Reporting

mitigation_taken: ['The acting judge sought clarification from the parties about the fabricated citations.', 'The acting judge asked whether the situation aligned with the recent Mavundla case in the KwaZulu-Natal Division.', 'Junior counsel Giles Barclay-Beuthin provided a corrected version of the heads of argument in which the problematic paragraphs were replaced.', "The court gave Northbound's counsel another chance to respond.", "Barclay-Beuthin acknowledged to the court that the non-existent citations likely originated from an AI tool called 'Legal Genius'.", 'Senior counsel Arnold Subel SC took full responsibility for the oversight and apologised.', "The acting judge accepted the legal team's apologies.", "The acting judge ordered that the conduct of Northbound's legal practitioners be referred to the Legal Practice Council for investigation.", 'The acting judge endorsed the reasoning from the Mavundla case and a recent English High Court decision warning of the dangers of relying on GenAI without verification.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Incident Reporting; Regulatory, Policy & Legal Mandates; Safety Decision Frameworks

mitigation_taken: ['Factcrescendo investigated the circulating video and claims to verify whether President Anura Kumara Dissanayake made the statement and whether an official investment scheme existed.', "Factcrescendo reviewed the 'Satana' program broadcast on May 3 and confirmed the President did not make any statements about the alleged investment scheme.", "Factcrescendo examined the circulating video and determined the voice did not match the President's and showed signs of manipulation or AI generation.", 'Factcrescendo confirmed that the web URL used in the post does not belong to the official Daily Mirror website.', 'Factcrescendo contacted Gayan Sampath, one of the journalists who hosted the program, who confirmed that no such statement about the investment opportunity was made.', 'Factcrescendo reached out to journalist Kalindu Karunaratne, who confirmed the President did not make the alleged statements and stated that the circulating article is fake.', 'Factcrescendo contacted the Presidential Media Division, which confirmed the President did not make the investment claims and stated the video was created using artificial intelligence and that the government has no plans to launch such a program.', 'Sri Lanka CERT confirmed the circulating content is a scam and warned the public to be cautious of such fraudulent online schemes.', 'Cybersecurity expert Asela Widyanakara analyzed the viral posts and warned that clicking misleading links can redirect users to external applications designed to compromise personal details.', 'Factcrescendo advised the public not to trust sensationalized financial claims tied to celebrities without verification from reliable sources.', 'Factcrescendo advised the public to avoid clicking on suspicious links or entering personal information on unverified platforms.', 'Factcrescendo urged people to report misleading or fraudulent social media posts to relevant authorities.', 'Factcrescendo recommended verifying news articles by visiting the official websites of reputed media outlets.']

mitigation_taken: ['The State Department said it will carry out a thorough investigation.', 'The State Department said it will continue to implement safeguards to prevent this from happening in the future.', 'The State Department cable urged U.S. diplomats to report any impersonation attempts to the Bureau of Diplomatic Security.', 'The Bureau of Diplomatic Security is investigating the matter.', "The State Department cable urged non-State Department officials to alert the FBI's Internet Crime Complaint Center.", "The episode involving Susie Wiles's phone breach spurred a White House and FBI investigation.", 'In May, the FBI issued a public warning that malicious actors were impersonating senior U.S. officials in an ongoing text and voice messaging campaign and advised recipients not to assume such messages are authentic.', "The incident contributed to Michael Waltz's ouster.", 'The incident curtailed the widespread use of the Signal app for national security group meetings.', "Ukraine's Security Service announced that Russian intelligence agents were impersonating the agency to recruit Ukrainian civilians for sabotage missions.", 'The Canadian Anti-Fraud Center and the Canadian Center for Cyber Security warned that scammers were utilizing artificial intelligence to impersonate senior government officials to steal sensitive information or money or to insert malware into computer networks.']

mitigation_taken: ['The ABC7 I-Team called the scammer and never heard back.', "Victims reported cryptocurrency scams to the FBI's Internet Crime Complaint Center (IC3), and the FBI said those reports were skyrocketing.", 'The FBI advised victims to report fraud quickly to the Internet Crime Complaint Center (IC3) so the bureau may be able to help recover money.', 'Private blockchain companies can be hired to trace the crypto trail.', 'Lionsgate Network said it can generate a forensic analysis report to locate stolen cryptocurrency quickly.', 'Lionsgate Network said it can provide the forensic information to authorities even though it cannot recover the money itself.', 'Lionsgate Network said it has been receiving several reports in the Chicago area of celebrity crypto cons.']

mitigation_taken: ['Judge Nina Y. Wang imposed sanctions on the two lawyers who represented Mike Lindell.', 'Judge Nina Y. Wang fined Christopher I. Kachouroff and Jennifer T. DeMaster $3,000 each.', 'Judge Wang found that the lawyers had violated a federal rule requiring lawyers to certify that the claims they make in court filings are grounded in the law.', 'At an April hearing, Judge Wang asked Mr. Kachouroff whether the court filing containing the errors had been generated by generative artificial intelligence.', 'At the same hearing, Judge Wang asked Mr. Kachouroff whether he had double-checked the citations in the filing.', 'Mr. Kachouroff acknowledged at the hearing that he personally did not check the citations and said he was responsible for them not being checked.', 'Mr. Kachouroff filed court papers asserting that he and his co-counsel had prepared a thoroughly cite-checked final document and that his co-counsel had mistakenly filed a draft version while he was on vacation.', 'Ms. DeMaster filed a statement apologizing to the court for mistakenly uploading the draft version and saying it was not done intentionally or in bad faith.', 'The High Court of England and Wales warned lawyers that they could face criminal prosecution for presenting false material generated by artificial intelligence.']

mitigation_taken: Irwin's mother reviewed his ChatGPT chat log in search of answers; Irwin's mother prompted ChatGPT to self-report what went wrong; ChatGPT admitted it had failed to interrupt the interaction and had given the illusion of sentient companionship; Irwin was taken to the emergency room after acting aggressively; The county medical health crisis team returned him to the hospital; Irwin was admitted to a mental-health hospital for 17 days and later rehospitalized; Irwin deleted ChatGPT; OpenAI is working to reduce amplification of negative behavior, train real-time distress recognition, and develop de-escalation methods.

mitigation_taken: ['The repository that had been mistakenly made public was set to private.', 'Lasso investigated further.', 'Lasso extracted a list of repositories that were public at any point in 2024.', 'Lasso identified which of those repositories had since been deleted or set to private.', "Lasso used Bing's caching mechanism to find that more than 20,000 since-private GitHub repositories still had data accessible through Copilot.", 'Lasso reached out to all affected companies that were "severely affected" by the data exposure.', 'Lasso advised those affected companies to rotate or revoke any compromised keys.', 'Lasso informed Microsoft of its findings in November 2024.', "Microsoft removed links to Bing's cache from its search results starting December 2024.", 'The caching feature was disabled.', 'Microsoft deleted the referenced GitHub repository that Lasso used Copilot to retrieve.', 'Amazon told TechCrunch that it was not affected by the issue.', 'Lasso removed all references to AWS following the advice of its legal team.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Incident Response & Recovery; Incident Reporting; Model & Infrastructure Security; Access Management

mitigation_taken: ['Fact-checkers investigated the viral video and confirmed that the depicted orca attack was fabricated.', 'Fact-checkers searched marine park employment records, public databases, and news coverage and found no record of Jessica Radcliffe.', 'Investigators searched official marine safety reports and found no evidence of the alleged attack.', 'Analysts examined the clip and identified AI-generated voiceovers combined with unrelated archival footage.', 'Experts advised viewers to check whether multiple reputable news outlets have reported the event before sharing.', 'Experts advised viewers to use reverse image or video searches to trace the original source and context of viral videos.', 'Experts advised viewers to look for signs of manipulation, such as blurred faces, mismatched audio and lip movements, unnatural lighting or shadows, and visual glitches around the mouth or jaw.', 'Fact-checking groups and analysts called for faster moderation by social media companies.', 'Fact-checking groups and analysts called for clear labelling of AI-generated content to help users distinguish fact from fiction.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Content Safety Controls; Training & Supportive Measures; Testing & Auditing

mitigation_taken: ['Microsoft pulled the Recall app back from release due to security concerns.', 'Microsoft paused and recalled the app multiple times during its launch process.', 'Microsoft returned Recall to Windows Insiders in April.', 'Microsoft stated in a November blog post that teams are working to improve the functionality of the security filter.', 'Users can block specific apps or websites from being captured by adding them to the blacklist in Settings > Privacy & Security > Recall & snapshots.']
assigned_subcategories: Staged Deployment; Incident Response & Recovery; System & Feature Restrictions; Model & Infrastructure Security; Testing & Auditing

mitigation_taken: ["School administrators contacted the student's parents after the AI program flagged his draft.", "The principal spoke with the student's mother after the AI alert, during which the mother explained the student was joking and there was no threat.", 'The principal called the family back and informed them the student was being suspended for 10 days, with the term possibly extendable after a hearing.', 'The district held a long-term suspension hearing during which the student was lectured that such speech was not acceptable.', 'The school imposed a final punishment of a 45-day suspension.']

mitigation_taken: ["McDonald's and Paradox.ai promptly resolved the identified flaws upon disclosure.", "Paradox.ai and McDonald's acknowledged the vulnerability within the hour after disclosure on June 30, 2025.", 'By July 1, default credentials were disabled.', 'By July 1, the internal API endpoint was secured.', 'Paradox.ai pledged to conduct further security audits.', 'Paradox.ai posted its version of events and a responsible security update to its website.']

mitigation_taken: ['Meta said that Big sis Billie is not Kendall Jenner and does not purport to be Kendall Jenner.', 'A Meta spokesman acknowledged the authenticity of the internal policy document reviewed by Reuters.', "Following Reuters' inquiries, Meta removed portions of its GenAI content risk standards that stated chatbots could flirt and engage in romantic or sensual roleplay with children.", 'Meta removed specific examples and notes in the document that were erroneous and inconsistent with its policies.', 'Meta said it is in the process of revising its content risk standards.', "Bue's family shared the events surrounding his death and transcripts of his chats with Reuters to warn the public.", "Bue's family examined his phone the next day, checking his call history, texts and Facebook Messenger to find clues about the identity of his supposed friend.", "Bue's family removed him from life support after doctors confirmed he was brain dead.", "Bue's family held a Buddhist memorial service for him in May."]
assigned_subcategories: Content Safety Controls; System Documentation; Governance Disclosure

mitigation_taken: ['They closely examined the video and identified inconsistencies in the facial expressions of both the tigers and the people.', 'They performed a reverse image search on Google and found extended versions of the video that explicitly stated it was AI-generated.', 'They found the same clip shared by other social media accounts, several of which explicitly stated the video was AI-created.', "They noted a 'Veo' watermark on the uncropped video, indicating it was created using Google's 'Veo' AI model.", "They used Google's SynthID tool, which confirmed the video was generated by Google AI.", 'They used AI-detection tools such as Hive, which reported an 89% probability that the video was AI-generated.', 'They archived the post and provided a link to the archived video.', 'They published a fact-check concluding that the claim is false and that the video is a deepfake created using AI.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Testing & Auditing; Content Safety Controls; Incident Reporting

mitigation_taken: ['The madrasa issued a show-cause notice on Thursday.', 'The headmaster and madrasa management spoke to the teacher about the video.', 'The madrasa had the video deleted immediately.', 'The teacher, Mohammad Yamin Mallik, deleted the video.', 'Mohammad Yamin Mallik sincerely apologised for the panic caused by the video.', 'Mohammad Yamin Mallik clarified that there are no tigers or any wild animals on campus.']

mitigation_taken: ['Senior defense lawyer Rishi Nathwani apologized to Justice James Elliott for filing submissions that included fake quotes and nonexistent case judgments.', 'Rishi Nathwani took full responsibility on behalf of the defense team for filing the incorrect information.', "Elliott's associates requested that the defense lawyers provide copies of the purported cases after they could not find the cited judgments.", 'The defense lawyers admitted that the cited cases did not exist and that the submission contained fictitious quotes.', 'In a 2023 U.S. case, a federal judge imposed $5,000 fines on two lawyers and a law firm for submitting fictitious legal research.', 'The two U.S. lawyers and their law firm apologized for submitting fictitious legal research.', 'The two U.S. lawyers and their law firm took remedial steps after the incident, which the judge credited in declining harsher sanctions.', 'Michael Cohen took the blame for citing fictitious court rulings invented by AI and said he did not realize the legal research tool could produce hallucinations.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Incident Reporting; Court & Law Enforcement Interventions; Financial, Economic & Compensation Remedies; Training & Supportive Measures

mitigation_taken: ['The police pulled surveillance video from the building.', 'The police interviewed the victim.', 'The police canvassed the area looking for more witnesses.', 'An investigator uploaded a still from the surveillance footage and ran a facial recognition search.', 'A human examiner selected Trevis Williams as the best candidate and generated a report warning he was only a "possible match".', "Investigators placed Mr. Williams's photo among six pictures and showed the photo array to the victim.", "The victim picked Mr. Williams's photo from the array and signed her name underneath the identification.", 'On April 21, the police took Mr. Williams into custody when they encountered him entering the subway.', 'The police interrogated Mr. Williams.', 'The police charged Mr. Williams the following day.', "Mr. Williams's lawyers performed a forensic analysis of his phone records showing his phone had communicated with cell towers around Brooklyn.", "Mr. Williams's lawyers prepared to use the phone record evidence in court.", 'The case against Mr. Williams was dismissed in July.', "The Manhattan district attorney's office sealed the case following its dismissal.", "Legal Aid sent a letter to the city's Department of Investigation asking the agency to look into police use of the facial recognition technology.", 'The police said the public lewdness case had been closed.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Court & Law Enforcement Interventions; Incident Reporting

mitigation_taken: ["Matt and Maria Raine created a foundation in Adam's name in the days after his death.", 'The Raines initially planned for the foundation to help pay funeral costs for other families whose children died from suicide.', "After reading Adam's conversations with ChatGPT, the Raines shifted the foundation's focus to making other families aware of what they see as the dangers of the technology.", 'Matt and Maria Raine filed a wrongful death lawsuit against OpenAI and its chief executive, Sam Altman.', 'Meetali Jain, director of the Tech Justice Law Project, filed the suit against OpenAI with the Edelson law firm on behalf of the Raines.', "One of the Raines' friends connected them with Meetali Jain after suggesting they consider a lawsuit.", "OpenAI issued an emailed statement expressing that it was deeply saddened by Mr. Raine's passing and offering condolences to his family.", 'OpenAI said it is working to make ChatGPT more supportive in moments of crisis by making it easier to reach emergency services.', 'OpenAI said it is working to make ChatGPT more supportive by helping people connect with trusted contacts.', 'OpenAI said it is working to make ChatGPT more supportive by strengthening protections for teens.', "Fidji Simo, OpenAI's chief executive of applications, posted a message in Slack alerting employees to a blog post and informing them about Adam's death on April 11."]
assigned_subcategories: Court & Law Enforcement Interventions; Model Safety Engineering; Training & Supportive Measures; User Rights & Recourse

mitigation_taken: ['Deloitte stood by the report and the findings.', 'Deloitte promised to correct errors in its references.', 'Deloitte supplied a new list of references, including three other chapters by Lisa Burton Crawford in edited works.', 'Deloitte communicated to the client that a few titles did not fully match the corresponding sources.', 'Deloitte said the references are being corrected.', 'The Department of Employment and Workplace Relations (DEWR) continues to investigate these claims.', 'DEWR has sought urgent advice from Deloitte on these matters.']

mitigation_taken: ['The researchers identified and investigated a network of YouTube channels operating out of Nigeria.', 'They published a post sharing their findings with the research community.', 'They sampled titles from 200 videos to analyze title duplication across channels.', 'They ran searches for each channel email address on OSINT Industries to associate emails with names, usernames, and accounts.', 'They analyzed public Facebook profiles to identify familial relationships among the apparent operators.', 'They triangulated account data from OSINT Industries queries to confirm links between online profiles and the operators.', 'They redacted full names, emails, and social profiles in their reporting due to inconclusive evidence about intent, funding, or ideological alignment.', 'They invited other researchers to reach out with information about the network and its operators.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Testing & Auditing; Incident Reporting; Data Governance

mitigation_taken: ['US District Judge Anna Manasco said she was considering a wide range of sanctions against Butler Snow, including fines, mandated continuing legal education, referrals to licensing organizations, and temporary suspensions.', 'At the hearing, attorneys with Butler Snow apologized and said they would accept whatever sanctions Manasco determined were appropriate.', 'Matthew Reeves submitted a declaration to the court acknowledging that he used ChatGPT, failed to verify the case citations through independent review, took full responsibility for the lapse, and expressed sincere regret.', 'William Lunsford said he had begun conducting a review of prior filings to make sure there were not more instances of false citations.', 'Judge Manasco allowed Butler Snow to file a motion within 10 days explaining what their process will be for addressing the problem before the court decides on sanctions.', 'Lawyers for Johnson filed a motion pointing out the fabricated citations and suggesting they were the product of generative artificial intelligence.', 'Judge Manasco scheduled a hearing to determine whether the Butler Snow attorneys should be sanctioned.', 'The court conducted independent searches for each allegedly fabricated citation and found no results.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Regulatory, Policy & Legal Mandates; Training & Supportive Measures; Incident Response & Recovery

mitigation_taken: ["Meta said it is looking into why Meta AI provided extreme weight-loss advice for the reporter's test account.", "Meta said it is investigating the memories it kept in the reporter's test account.", "Meta said it is actively working to address the issues raised by Common Sense Media's report.", 'Meta said it trains its AI not to promote self-harm.', 'Meta said its AIs are trained to connect people to support resources in sensitive situations.', 'Meta said Meta AI is trained to respond to certain therapy prompts with a reminder that it is not a licensed professional.', 'Meta said it is continuing to improve its enforcement while exploring how to further strengthen protections for teens.', 'Common Sense Media worked for two months with clinical psychiatrists at the Stanford Brainstorm lab to test Meta AI.', 'Common Sense Media launched a petition calling on Meta to prohibit users under the age of 18 from using Meta AI.', 'Common Sense Media launched a petition calling on Meta to implement better safeguards for sensitive conversations.', "Common Sense Media launched a petition calling on Meta to allow users, including parents monitoring teen accounts, to turn off Meta AI in Meta's social apps.", 'Common Sense Media shared a report that included a warning for parents and a demand that Meta keep kids under 18 away from Meta AI.', 'New York state passed a law that includes guardrails for social chatbots for users of all ages.', 'A California bill known as AB 1064 was proposed that would effectively ban kids from using companion bots.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Model Alignment; Content Safety Controls; User Rights & Recourse; Regulatory, Policy & Legal Mandates

mitigation_taken: ['We banned the accounts involved in the Claude Code extortion operation as soon as we discovered it.', 'We developed a tailored classifier (an automated screening tool) to detect similar activity.', 'We introduced a new detection method to help us discover activity like this as quickly as possible in the future.', 'We shared technical indicators about the attack with relevant authorities.', 'We immediately banned the relevant accounts involved in the North Korean employment fraud.', 'We improved our tools for collecting, storing, and correlating the known indicators of this scam.', 'We shared our findings about the employment scheme with the relevant authorities.', 'We will continue to monitor for attempts to commit fraud using our services.', 'We banned the account associated with the AI-generated ransomware operation.', 'We alerted our partners about the ransomware operation.', 'We implemented new methods for detecting malware upload, modification, and generation.', 'We updated our preventative safety measures based on the abuses we uncovered.', 'We shared details of our findings, including indicators of misuse, with third-party safety teams.']
assigned_subcategories: Access Management; Model & Infrastructure Security; Testing & Auditing; Incident Reporting; Post-Deployment Monitoring

mitigation_taken: ['In July, the National Police singled out a campaign on TikTok.', 'The National Police warned that every day officers detect hundreds of new accounts created to misinform and manipulate society.', 'TikTok said it was working with the authorities in Moldova to install additional safety and security measures ahead of the election.', 'In June, TikTok shut down a network of 314 accounts with more than 100,000 followers that targeted Moldovan audiences.', "WatchDog published a report finding more than 900 accounts linked to Russia working in concert on Moldova's most popular apps.", 'NewsGuard documented 39 fabricated narratives targeting Moldova in a three-month period.', 'Check First and Reset Tech released a report documenting an AI-fuelled escalation of the Kremlin-linked propaganda effort that shifted focus to Moldova.', "After a meeting with the country's security council, President Maia Sandu detailed numerous ways the Kremlin sought to exert its influence.", 'President Maia Sandu accused Ilan Shor of being a conduit for the Russian efforts.', 'President Trump used Truth Social to threaten tariffs on countries that penalize tech giants.', "Secretary of State Marco Rubio ordered diplomats to lobby to weaken or reverse laws such as the European Union's Digital Services Act."]
assigned_subcategories: Content Safety Controls; Post-Deployment Monitoring; Incident Response & Recovery; Incident Investigation; Societal Impact Assessment

mitigation_taken: ["Prosecutors in the Montana Attorney General's Office charged Shy Herbert McCutchan with three felony counts of sexual abuse of children for possession of explicit images and videos depicting a child under the age of 12.", "The Carter County Sheriff's Office and the Division of Criminal Investigation arrested McCutchan in Alzada.", "The National Center for Missing and Endangered Children received multiple cyber tips that led to the launch of the investigation into CSAM uploaded from McCutchan's devices.", "DCI's Internet Crimes Against Children Unit and the Carter County Sheriff's Office investigated the case.", 'House Bill 82 was passed and signed into law during the 2025 Legislative Session to allow prosecution of sex predators who utilize artificial intelligence to digitally alter images.', 'A state District Court judge ordered McCutchan held on a $250,000 bond.', 'An arraignment for McCutchan was set for September 9.', 'Assistant Attorneys General Daniel Guzynski and Stephanie Robles are prosecuting the case.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Investigation; Court & Law Enforcement Interventions; Incident Response & Recovery; Regulatory, Policy & Legal Mandates; Incident Reporting

mitigation_taken: ['Bank of Ireland warned consumers to watch out for fake investment adverts circulating online, mainly originating via Meta platforms.', 'Bank of Ireland urged the public to remain vigilant about these scams.', 'Bank of Ireland advised people not to engage with such fake investment content if they see it.', 'Consumers were advised to ignore any unsolicited investment offers encountered online.', 'Consumers were advised to verify financial products through their bank or a trusted financial advisor.', 'Consumers were advised to check the Central Bank of Ireland register (ROI) to confirm that an investment firm is regulated.', 'Consumers were advised not to invest if a firm is not listed on the Central Bank of Ireland register.', 'Bank of Ireland offered a 24/7 fraud telephone support line for customers on 1800 946 764, available every day of the year.']

mitigation_taken: ['Genians Security Center detected the new AI-generated fake military ID phishing approach in July 2025.', 'GSC warned about the Kimsuky phishing campaign.', 'GSC said that Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) systems are essential to detect and neutralise these types of attacks.', "Researchers noted tell-tale strings like 'Start_juice' and 'Eextract_juice' appearing in the attackers' code.", 'Hackread.com translated the second phishing email image with the help of an AI image translator.', 'OpenAI reported in June 2025 that North Korean threat actors created fake identities with AI to pass technical job interviews.']

mitigation_taken: ["Juliana Peralta's parents filed a lawsuit against Character AI in Colorado.", "The lawsuit asks the court to award damages to Juliana's parents.", 'The lawsuit asks the court to order Character AI to make changes to its app, including measures to protect minors.', 'Character AI issued a public statement saying it takes the safety of its users very seriously and has invested substantial resources in Trust and Safety.', 'Character AI added a pop-up resource around October 2024 directing users who use phrases related to self-harm and suicide to the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (988).', 'Three product-liability claims were filed on behalf of underage users against Character AI.', 'The three lawsuits also name Google as a defendant.', 'All three families are represented by the Social Media Victims Law Center.', "Juliana's mother, Montoya, turned to the Social Media Victims Law Center for help.", "A tech consultant came to Montoya's house to help her retrieve Juliana's conversations inside the Character AI app from her phone.", 'OpenAI said it is working to make its chatbot more supportive to users in crisis and is adding parental controls to ChatGPT.', 'The Senate subcommittee on crime and counterterrorism scheduled a hearing to debate the potential harms of AI chatbots.', 'California lawmakers passed a bill that would mandate safeguards for chatbots, including requiring companies to implement protocols to handle discussions about suicide and self-harm.', 'The Federal Trade Commission said it would investigate child safety concerns around AI companions from Alphabet, Meta, Character and others.', "Apple's App Store currently lists the Character AI app as suitable for users 18+."]
assigned_subcategories: Court & Law Enforcement Interventions; Regulatory, Policy & Legal Mandates; Content Safety Controls; System & Feature Restrictions; Governance Disclosure

mitigation_taken: ['Nx maintainers published an official security advisory.', 'Snyk is tracking the incident via published Snyk advisories.', 'All compromised package versions were removed from the npm registry.', 'npm purged the affected versions and tokens.', "The Nx organization's access was revoked.", "Search your GitHub account for repositories named 's1ngularity-repository-*'.", 'If such repositories are found, take immediate actions as instructed by your ProdSec and InfoSec teams.', 'Rotate GitHub tokens immediately.', 'Rotate npm tokens immediately.', 'Rotate SSH keys immediately.', 'Rotate any API keys stored in .env files immediately.', 'Audit and clean your environment as instructed by your ProdSec team.', "Run 'npm ls nx' and check package-lock.json to identify usage of Nx across projects.", 'If projects are affected, uninstall the compromised Nx versions.', 'If projects are affected, install nx@latest.', 'Use Snyk SCA and Snyk SBOM to locate and monitor projects organization-wide.', 'If AI CLIs are installed, review your shell history for dangerous flags such as --dangerously-skip-permissions, --yolo, and --trust-all-tools.', "Enforce the lockfile in CI by using 'npm ci'.", 'Disable install scripts by default, for example by using the --ignore-scripts flag.', 'Set ignore-scripts=true in a user- or project-scoped .npmrc to neutralize malicious postinstall scripts.', "Enable npm two-factor authentication in auth-and-writes mode by running 'npm profile enable-2fa auth-and-writes'.", 'Verify package provenance before installing whenever possible.', 'Pre-flight installs using npq or Snyk Advisor to gate installations on trust signals and Snyk intel.', 'Consider aliasing npm to npq locally.', "Continuously scan and monitor with Snyk using 'snyk test' and 'snyk monitor' to catch new disclosures and automate fixes.", 'Use a private or proxied registry (for example, Verdaccio) to reduce direct exposure and enforce publishing and consumption policies.']
assigned_subcategories: Incident Response & Recovery; Access Management; Testing & Auditing; Incident Reporting; Model & Infrastructure Security

mitigation_taken: ["Stefanina's posted a public warning asking patrons not to use Google AI to find out the restaurant's specials.", "Stefanina's directed customers to check the restaurant's Facebook page or website for accurate specials.", "Stefanina's announced it will not honor specials generated by Google AI."]
assigned_subcategories: Risk Disclosure; User Rights & Recourse; Market Access & Commercial Restrictions; Governance Disclosure

mitigation_taken: ["Australia's eSafety Commissioner announced a plan to target AI chatbots as part of new reforms.", 'The eSafety Commissioner registered six new codes under the Online Safety Act.', 'The new codes come into effect in March next year.', 'The new codes will introduce safeguards covering AI chatbot apps and will require technology manufacturers to verify the ages of users if they try to access harmful content.', 'In response to the investigation, Nomi said it had recently made improvements to its core AI.', "Nomi's chief executive Alex Cardinell issued a statement saying countless users had shared stories of how Nomi helped them overcome mental health challenges, trauma and discrimination.", 'A law in California was enacted that requires occasional reminders to users that they are talking to a bot rather than a human.']
assigned_subcategories: Regulatory, Policy & Legal Mandates; Content Safety Controls; Usage & Access Limitations; System & Feature Restrictions; Model Safety Engineering
